description: Extract numeric-ish tables from PDFs into per-PDF CSVs and a combined CSV.
Scrape numeric-leaning tables from OA PDFs via Semantic Scholar.
Short, human-readable sentence about what this script does.
bulk_mol_id.sh — Batch molecule rendering + metadata rename
gif_from_mov.sh — Convert .mov to .gif with tunable settings
Draw a 2D molecule image from a SMILES, InChI, or InChIKey.

usage:
usage: quick_react.py [-h] [--bond-cutoff BOND_CUTOFF] [--size W H]
[--dpi DPI] [--ms MS] [--frame-digits FRAME_DIGITS]
[--outdir OUTDIR] [--gif GIF] [--version]
